description: It'd be nice to be able to query deleted objs via the API.  There are pre-existing sqlalchemy API filters implementing this as 'read_deleted' just needs to be incorporated into the EC2 API contexts.
title: EC2 API should allow query deleted objects

comments.content: It'd be nice to be able to query deleted objs via the API.  There are pre-existing sqlalchemy API filters implementing this as 'read_deleted' just needs to be incorporated into the EC2 API contexts.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jtran

comments.content:
From Devin on the merge prop:
"I disagree with this premise.  Querying deleted objects should only ever be done internally within nova and that is not a function that should be exposed at the API level.  I do not believe this should be implemented."
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
